qas.question: Beyonce self proclaimed alter ego is named what?
Her alter ego was born when according to Beyonce?
What year did Beyonce do away with Sasha Fierce?
Beyonce brought back Sasha Fierce during which event?
Later what did she say about Sasha?
What is the name of Beyoncé's alter ego?
When did Beyoncé introduce Sasha Fierce?
Sasha Fierce was created during the making of what song?
Who did Beyoncé tell in February 2010 that Sasha Fierce was no longer needed?

context: Described as being "sexy, seductive and provocative" when performing on stage, Beyoncé has said that she originally created the alter ego "<a0_0>Sasha Fierce<a0_0/>" to keep that stage persona separate from who she really is. She described Sasha as being "<a4_0>too aggressive, too strong<a4_0/>, too sassy [and] too sexy", stating, "I'm not like her in real life at all." Sasha was conceived during the <a1_0>making of "<a8_0>Crazy in Love<a8_0/>"<a1_0/>, and Beyoncé introduced her with the release of her <a7_0>2008<a7_0/> album I Am... <a6_0>Sasha Fierce.<a6_0/> In February <a2_0>2010<a2_0/>, she announced in an interview with <a9_0>Allure magazine<a9_0/> that she was comfortable enough with herself to no longer need Sasha Fierce. However, Beyoncé announced in May 2012 that <a5_0>she would bring her back<a5_0/> for her <a3_0>Revel Presents: Beyoncé Live<a3_0/> shows later that month.
